text: “Only in the darkness can you see the stars.”
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: “Only in the darkness can you see the stars.”
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

text: “You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one.”
author: John Lennon
